violations.title: JWT Missing Organization Claims
violations.description: JWT payload missing 'organization_id' claim required for multi-tenant isolation. Only 'sub' and 'roles' claims are extracted.
violations.exploitation_impact: ANY USER CAN ACCESS ANY ORGANIZATION'S DATA
violations.remediation: Add organization_id extraction and validation in JWT processing. Ensure all JWTs include organization_id claim.

violations.title: Repository Layer Missing ABAC Enforcement
violations.description: Base repository missing ABAC enforcement - queries do not filter by organization_id.
violations.exploitation_impact: ANY USER CAN ACCESS ANY ORGANIZATION'S DATA
violations.remediation: Implement mandatory organization_id filtering in all repository methods.

violations.title: Missing Generator Database Model
violations.description: Missing Generator database model required for tracking AI model plugins.
violations.exploitation_impact: Cannot track or audit AI model usage
violations.remediation: Create Generator model for AI model tracking

violations.title: No Container Sandboxing Infrastructure
violations.description: No container-based sandboxing for untrusted model execution.
violations.exploitation_impact: UNTRUSTED AI MODELS CAN EXECUTE ARBITRARY CODE
violations.remediation: Implement Docker-based sandboxing for model execution

violations.title: Missing Templating Service Sandboxing
violations.description: No sandboxed Jinja2 implementation for attack payload generation.

violations.title: Evidence Storage Model Missing
violations.description: Missing evidence document storage for prompt/response pairs.
violations.remediation: Create Evidence model for session tracking

violations.title: API Keys Stored in Application Database
violations.description: API keys stored as SHA256 hashes in main database.
violations.exploitation_impact: DATABASE BREACH EXPOSES ALL API CREDENTIALS
violations.remediation: Use dedicated secrets manager for API keys

violations.title: API Key Generation Stores Hashes
violations.description: API key generation creates SHA256 hash for database storage.
violations.remediation: Store API keys in secrets manager

violations.title: Missing Orchestration State Model
violations.description: No orchestration_state.py for storing orchestration secrets and state.
violations.remediation: Create orchestration_state.py for orchestration state management

violations.title: Missing Orchestration Secrets Model
violations.description: No orchestration_secrets.py for storing orchestration secrets and state.
violations.remediation: Create orchestration_secrets.py for orchestration state management

violations.title: Missing Orchestration Config Model
violations.description: No orchestration_config.py for storing orchestration secrets and state.
violations.remediation: Create orchestration_config.py for orchestration state management

violations.title: Evidence Document Storage Missing
violations.description: Missing secure storage for authentication evidence and session tracking.
violations.remediation: Add evidence storage to session model
